translations.chinese: 春二 月，使樊噲、周勃將兵擊綰。
translations.english: In the second month of spring, he sent Fan Kuai and Zhou Bo to lead troops to attack Lu Wan.

translations.chinese: 詔曰：「燕王綰與吾有故，愛之如子，聞與陳豨有謀，吾以為亡有，故使人迎綰。
translations.english: The edict said: "King Yan Lu Wan has old relations with me. I love him like a son. Hearing he had plots with Chen Xi, I thought there was nothing to it, so I sent people to welcome Lu Wan.
Lu Wan claimed illness and did not come. His rebellion is clear.

translations.chinese: 燕吏民非有罪也，賜其吏六 百石以上爵各一級。
translations.english: Yan officials and people have no crime. Grant officials of 600 piculs and above each one rank.

translations.chinese: 與綰居，去來歸者，赦之，加爵亦一級。」
translations.english: Those who lived with Lu Wan and come and go returning, pardon them, add one rank also."
